location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'CORRECTIONS TO THE GAZETTEER OF PERSIA VOLUME III'

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 54; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. An additional foliation sequence is present in parallel between ff 4-53; these numbers are printed, and are not circled.

mods.abstract: The volume consists of corrections to the Gazetteer of Persia Volume III(1st Series, 1918). It provides an index to the sub-tribes referred to in the volume.Printed at the Government Monotype Press, Simla, 1918.
